New Records: Sale had six strikeouts to match San Diego's Dylan Cease for the major league lead with 197 this year and set a single-season Braves franchise record for a left-hander.
Key Match Events: Matt Olson hit an RBI double and Luke Williams added a two-run double in a four-run seventh that broke the game open against Minnesota's beleaguered bullpen
Soler threw out a runner at the plate late
Post-Match Reflections: Sale lowered his ERA to 2.58, currently the best in MLB

Miscellaneous Highlights: Twins rookie David Festa (2-4) had his finest start to date spoiled by Sale and Soler
The Twins got only one run across in the sixth despite four hits and three straight to start the frame
